settings.title: Design
settings.caption:
Design and layout of an instrument panel can be a tedious and complicated process. Our experienced designers and technicians know how to maximize available space. Our knowledge of avionics and instruments for kit panels results in practical, reliable, affordable designs.

Starting with a scale panel drawing and avionics specifications, we transform your ideas into a complete drawing. As part of the design process, we can assist you with placement of items in the panel, as well as interface considerations.

Once your panel is laid out, a complete quote is provided including all parts and labor listed. You know exactly what your panel will cost. There are no hidden surprises.

Once we have approval to start fabricating the panel, it is laid out by the technician to ensure a perfect fit. A great deal of time goes into the layout before the first hole is drilled.

settings.title: WIRING
settings.caption:
The system interconnect wiring is a critical part of any avionics installation. We use only the best MIL Spec quality wire, connectors, tools and specialized equipment to ensure the installation meets all FAA approved guidelines and manufacturer's instructions.

Using manufacturer installation manuals and custom designed interface systems, your panel is completely wired. All non-panel mounted instruments or remote boxes are wired to mating connectors or terminated as needed.

Our technicians take the worry out of even the most complicated packages by ensuring all the systems are wired correctly and interfaced together. Each system is double-checked for proper continuity prior to any power being applied.

settings.title: FABRICATION
settings.caption:
Expert panel build-up is our specialty. From avionics to instruments and all associated components, we provide professionally finished panels that are both beautiful and functional. By having all the specialized tools and equipment, we can ensure a proper fit and professional look to your panel.

Once panel layout and design is determined, all components are assembled and fitted to your panel. All switches, breakers, light assemblies and other parts are properly wired and installed. The radio stack is fitted to the panel, as well as any required supports or mounting rails.

Prior to final assembly, the panel and all sub-assemblies are custom painted as needed. Panels are engraved and all custom placards are provided.

settings.title: INSTALLATION
settings.caption:
Gulf Coast Avionics does professional avionics and instruments installation for a variety of business and personal aircraft. Our experience gives you the best possible installation for your kit aircraft as well.

Once all panel, radio, and remote assemblies have been completed, your panel is completely assembled and tested. All systems are inspected, as well as calibrated as needed. After we have confirmed all systems are operational, the panel is then professionally packaged for shipment.

settings.title: Do I qualify for Clyde Protection Plan options?
settings.caption:
The Clyde Protection Plan is available to you if all of the following are true:

  • You are a customer in the United States of America (excluding territories)
  • You purchased directly from Retailer on Retailer’s Website URL
  • Your order was placed on or after March 24th, 2020.
  • You purchased an eligible product

settings.title: How do I purchase a protection plan?
settings.caption:
There are three ways to add a Clyde Protection Plan to your product:

  • Gulf Coast Avionics’s website: Customers can choose the Clyde protection plan option at checkout when purchasing their product.
  • Through the link in the post-purchase email within 30 days of purchasing the product: After purchase, customers will receive an email from Clyde offering the option to add protection. Customers can click the link in the email which will direct them to the Clyde website. When using the email to purchase a Clyde protection plan, there is no need to create a Clyde account prior to the purchase of the plan.
  • Directly from Clyde’s customer portal, HiClyde.com: Customers have 30 days from the date of purchase or the delivery date (if provided to Clyde) to purchase a protection plan. It will be necessary to create a Clyde account prior to completing the plan purchase through this method. Customers must use the same email address that was used when purchasing a product when creating an account to link to their sales order.

settings.title: When are you ineligible to purchase a Clyde Protection Plan
settings.caption:
• Customers cannot purchase a protection plan after an accident occurs
  • Customers cannot purchase a protection plan after 30 days from the product’s purchase date or delivery date if provided to Clyde.

settings.title: How can I file a claim?
settings.caption: To file a claim on HiClyde.com, customers have two options. They can log into their account, select the appropriate product, and click “File a Claim,” or they can file a claim as a guest by entering the Contract ID found in their confirmation email into the homepage on HiClyde.com. Customers typically receive an update on their claim within 48-72 hours and can check in on the status of their claim in their Clyde account at any time.

settings.title: Can I file multiple claims?
settings.caption:
Yes, you can file multiple claims using your Clyde Protection Plan during the course of the contract’s term. You are covered for multiple repairs up to the value of the original product purchase price.

If your claim is approved for a replacement product, then your contract is void. You will have the option to purchase a new protection plan for your replacement on HiClyde.com.

settings.title: Is the Clyde Protection Plan transferable?
settings.caption: Yes, this plan may be transferred to any person in the United States. To initiate the transfer of a plan, contact Clyde at protection@hiclyde.com.

settings.title: Does this Plan provide coverage for theft or lost items?
settings.caption: No, this Plan does not cover for loss or theft.

settings.title: Can the Clyde Protection Plan be canceled?
settings.caption:
Yes, plans may be canceled. Reimbursement will be prorated based on time remaining on the contract and reduced by value of any claims previously covered. A full refund is available if the cancellation is made within 30 days of purchase.

Please contact support@gca.areo to cancel your Clyde contract.

settings.heading: What's your trade in worth?
settings.subheading: See the great trade-in vaules offered by Gulf Coast Avionics
settings.content1: Trade-in applies towards a purchase of a new Garmin GPSMAP 695, 696, or Aera 500, 510, 550, 560, 795, 796 and 660. Trade-in must be complete with all accessories listed below, and the unit must look good cosmetically and be in good working condition. Any unit not meeting this requirement will have a lesser trade-in value or may be returned.
settings.content2:
• 1. Once you receive your new Garmin GPS, please call our customer service number at 800-474-9714 with your invoice number and model of unit to be traded. A Return Authorization Number (RMA) will be provided for the return of your trade-in to Gulf Coast Avionics.
  • 2. After we receive your trade-in and it is verified that the unit is complete with applicable accessories and in good cosmetic and working condition, we will credit you the trade-in value. Trade-ins with missing accessories will add delay to the credit process.
settings.content3: To verify current trade-in values, please call 800-474-9714 or email us at info@gca.aero. We will beat any other supplier's price on any unit.

settings.title: Lightspeed ANR Headsets
settings.specification1: ZULU (Original) Battery Power w/Dual GA Plugs
settings.specification2: ZULU.2 Battery Power w/Dual GA Plugs

settings.title: David Clark Headets
settings.specification1: DC Pro X Battery Power w/Dual GA Plugs
settings.specification2: DC Pro X Lemo / Panel Power
settings.specification3: DC One X Battery Power w/Dual GA Plugs
settings.note: If your trade-in headset is not listed above, please call us. We will make an offer on most David Clark and Telex headsets.

settings.heading: Headset Trade-up Program
settings.content:
Gulf Coast Avionics Headset Trade-Up Program allows the trade-in of a working headset
                towards the purchase of a new headset with a value of $650 or higher. The used headset must be in good
                working order with no exposed wires, cracks, obvious damage, or engravings, and original ear seals in
                good condition. Any costs involved in repairing the headset or replacing ear seals will reduce the
                trade-in value. Any non-repairable or unacceptable headset will be returned.
settings.step1: Purchase your new headset either online or by calling 800-474-9714.
settings.step2: If you’re calling in your order, let the sales representative know you are trading in a headset, and a Return Authorization will be provided you to send with the trade-in. If ordering online, please call Customer Service at 863-709-9714 to obtain the Return Authorization.
settings.step3:
Once we have received, checked out the
                    headset, and verified the headset is acceptable, we will either issue a credit to the same credit
                    card used for the new headset purchase, or we will mail a check.
settings.content2:
Call Customer Service for a Return Authorization and send that with the headset. Once the headset
                has been received and evaluated, you will receive a telephone call from our Sales Dept to help
                you place your order for the new headset minus the trade-in value.

settings.heading: STEP 2 – SELECT STANDARD OR HIGH-PERFORMANCE LRU KIT

settings.banner_title: Garmin G3X Touch Quote & Order Worksheet
settings.banner_heading: Build Your Custom Garmin G3X Touch Package
settings.banner_desc:
Use the worksheet below to compile a list of the components that you need to get the features and
capabilities you're looking for in your Garmin G3X system. Once you have selected all of the items,
submit a request at the bottom of the page and we will provide you with a comprehensive
quote including a discount based on the package as a whole.
